newsitem.title: UK: Pifco sets sights on Kenwood - report.
newsitem.headline: Pifco sets sights on Kenwood - report.

text.p: Household appliances group Pifco Holdings Plc is seeking to acquire its much larger rival Kenwood Appliances Plc, the Financial Times (FT) newspaper said on Monday.
Combined, the two companies would have sales approaching 250 million stg, giving them more clout to compete in the European appliances market, the FT said.
Pifco chairman Michael Webber told the FT on Sunday that there was "sound commercial and industrial logic for putting the two companies together."
Kenwood is due to report six-month results on Tuesday.
